1.1.0.en: Added FB Messenger. Added Telegram. Added device display - last sent date/time. New app image.

1.3.1.en: Fix last sent for image sending.

1.4.0.en: Updated README instructions. Added Russian and Polish voice message. Improved image sending. Rate limit check for FB image sending. Error feedback in flow. Added group message to Telegram (UNTESTED).
